text: Roni Hossen (born 10 July 2000) is a Bangladeshi cricketer. He made his List A debut for Brothers Union in the 2017–18 Dhaka Premier Division Cricket League on 13 February 2018. Prior to his List A debut, he was part of Bangladesh's squad for the 2018 Under-19 Cricket World Cup. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:Brothers Union cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
